name: Basal Rose Shoot
text: Special Summon 1 "Rose Dragon" monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position. If this Set card is destroyed: You can target 1 of your "Black Rose Dragon", or 1 of your monsters that specifically lists that card in its text, that is banished or in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Basal Rose Shoot" once per turn.
